content: Mikey- I had a simmilar experience with a representative of Northern Mich. "Nice" guy to talk with, seemed attentive and understanding, was very personable........ then WHAM! Stabbed a whole town in the back, to benefit one rich sob in a neighboring town who gave him a nice donation. With one stroke, he increased the economic spiral of a whole community, for the sake of a single rich individual...... Since I moved to Va., I couldn't vote on the Mich. ballot..... too bad, cause I know HE wouldn't have gotten my vote. I think ALL incumbents need to "take a vacation" by the special wishes of the voters...... MAYBE the msg would sink into D.C. offices that things have got to start changing.....
